column1: Little Goat Diner////I love the food
column3: and atmosphere here. There's not enough clean
column5: stylish diners in Chicago so this one was a treat. I had the pulled pork sandwich/burger. I can't remember but I remember it being so delicious. I devoured the whole thing before my friend finished dinner. Our hostesses yesterday
column7: was very friendly and accommodating as well. She checked up on us a few times while the waitress was busy to make sure we were alright. Good vibes. Good food. Awesome cocktails and selection of drinks. Definitely coming back!
